SA20sthtvbhu:3_1: tathā hy ātmadṛṣṭiprabhavā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhaś ca satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣatvāt tatprahāṇāya pravartamānaḥ sarvakleśān prajahāti /
SA20sthtvbhu:3_4: kleśā hi mokṣaprāpter āvaraṇam iti atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu mokṣo 'dhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:3_5: jñeyāvaraṇam api sarvasmin jñeye jñānapravṛttipratibandhabhūtam akliṣṭam ajñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:3_6: tasmin prahīṇe sarvākāre jñeye 'saktam apratihatañ ca jñānaṃ pravartata ity ataḥ sarvajñatvam adhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:4_0: atha vā dharmapudgalābhiniviṣṭāś cittamātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānantīty ato dharmapudgalanairātmyapradarśanena saphale vijñaptimātre 'nupūrveṇa praveśārthaṃ prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:5_0: atha vā vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata eveti kecin manyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:5_1: vijñeyavad vijñānam api saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata ity asya dviprakārasyāpy ekāntavādasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:9_3: vividha ity anekaprakāraḥ / ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ity evamādiko dharmopacāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_0: ayaṃ dviprakāro 'py upacāro vijñānapariṇāma eva na mukhye ātmani dharmeṣu ceti /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_1: kuta etat / dharmāṇām ātmanaś ca vijñānapariṇāmād bahir abhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_2: ko 'yaṃ pariṇāmo nāma / anyathātvam / kāraṇakṣaṇanirodhasamakālaḥ kāraṇakṣaṇavilakṣaṇaḥ kāryasyātmalābhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_3: tatrātmādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣād rūpādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣāc cālayavijñānād ātmādinirbhāso vikalpo rūpādinirbhāsaś cotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_4: [Tvbh_42] tam ātmādinirbhāsaṃ rūpādinirbhāsañ ca tasmād vikalpād bahirbhūtam ivopādāyātmādyupacāro rūpādidharmopacāraś cānādikālikaḥ pravartate vināpi bāhyenātmanā dharmaiś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:10_6: yac ca yatra nāsti tat tatropacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:11_0: evaṃ vijñānasvarūpe bahiś cātmadharmābhāvāt parikalpita evātmā dharmāś ca na tu paramārthataḥ santīti vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata evety ayam ekāntavādo nābhyupeyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:12_0: upacārasya ca nirādhārasyāsaṃbhavād avaśyaṃ vijñānapariṇāmo vastuto 'stīty upagantavyo yatrātmadharmopacāraḥ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:12_1: ataś cāyam abhyupagamo na yuktikṣamo vijñānam api vijñeyavat saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:12_2: saṃvṛtito 'py abhāvaprasaṅgān na hi saṃvṛtir nirupādānā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:13_0: tasmād ayam ekāntavādo dviprakāro 'pi niryuktikatvāt tyājya ity ācāryavacanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:13_1: evañ ca sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvatvād vastuto na vidyate vijñānaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād dravyato 'stīty abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:14_0: katham etad gamyate vinā bāhyenārthena vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:14_1: bāhyo hy arthaḥ svābhāsavijñānajanakatvena vijñānasyālambanapratyaya iṣyate na kāraṇatvamātreṇa samanantarādipratyayād viśeṣāprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:16_1: na ca sañcitam avayavasaṃhatimātrād anyad vidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:16_3: tasmād vinaiva bāhyenārthena vijñānaṃ sañcitākāram utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:17_0: na ca paramāṇava eva saṃcitās tasyālambanaṃ paramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:17_1: na hy asañcitāvasthātaḥ sañcitāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kaścid ātmātiśayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:17_2: tasmād asañcitavat sañcitā api paramāṇavo naivālambanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:18_0: anyas tu manyate / ekaika paramāṇur anyanirapekṣyo 'tīndriyo bahavas tu parasparāpekṣā indriyagrāhyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:18_1: teṣām api sāpekṣanirapekṣāvasthayor ātmātiśayābhāvād ekāntenendriyagrāhyatvam atīndriyatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:19_0: yadi ca paramāṇava eva parasparāpekṣā vijñānasya viṣayībhavanti /
SA20sthtvbhu:19_1: evaṃ sati yo 'yaṃ ghaṭakuḍyādyākārabhedo vijñāne sa na syāt praramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:19_3: na ca paramāṇavaḥ stambhādivat paramārthataḥ santy/
SA20sthtvbhu:20_0: tadanabhyupagame vā pūrvadakṣiṇāparottarādidigbhedo yaḥ sa paramāṇor na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:20_1: tataś ca vijñānavat paramāṇor apy amūrtatvam adeśasthatvañ ca prasajyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:20_2: evaṃ bāhyārthābhāvād vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyate svapnavijñānavad ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:20_4: na ca vartamānā vartamānajanakā utpadyamānāvasthāyām asattvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:20_5: [Tvbh_46] utpannāvasthāyāṃ vijñānasyāpi tadākāreṇotpannatvān na kiñcit kartavyam astīti manovijñānam apy anālambanam evotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:21_0: anyas tv āha / asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:21_1: upacāro hi triṣu satsu bhavati nānyatamābhāve mukhyapadārthe tatsadṛśe 'nyasmin viṣaye tayoś ca sādṛśye /
SA20sthtvbhu:21_2: tad yathā mukhye 'gnau tatsadṛśe ca māṇavake tayoś ca sādhāraṇe dharme kapilatve tīkṣṇatve vā saty agnir māṇavaka ity upacāraḥ kriyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:21_3: atra hy agnir māṇavaka iti jātir dravyaṃ vopacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:22_0: tatra tāvan na jāteḥ sādhāraṇaṃ kapilatvaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:22_1: na ca sādhāraṇadharmābhāve māṇavake jāter upacāro yujyate 'tiprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:22_4: jātyabhāve 'pi tīkṣṇatvakapilatvayor māṇavake darśanād avinābhāvitvam ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:23_1: na hi yo 'gnes tīkṣṇo guṇaḥ kapilo vā sa eva māṇavake /
SA20sthtvbhu:23_2: kiṃ tarhi tato 'nyaḥ / viśeṣasya svāśrayapratibaddhatvān na vināgniguṇenāgner māṇavake upacāro yuktaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:23_4: evam apy agniguṇasyaiva tīkṣṇasya kapilasya vā māṇavakaguṇe tīkṣṇe kapile vā sādṛśyād upacāro yukto na tu māṇavake 'gner guṇasādṛśyenāsaṃbandhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_1: pradhāne hi guṇarūpeṇaiva jñānābhidhāne pravartete tatsvarūpāsaṃsparśāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_3: na hi jñānābhidhānavyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārthasvarūpaparicchittyupāyo 'stīty ataḥ pradhānasvarūpaviṣayajñānābhidhānābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'stīty avagantavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_4: evaṃ yāvac chabde saṃbandhābhāvāj jñānābhidhānābhāva evañ cābhidhānābhidheyābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_5: api ca sarva evāyaṃ gauṇa eva na mukhyo 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_6: gauṇo hi nāma yo yatrāvidyamānena rūpeṇa pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_7: sarvaś ca śabdaḥ pradhāne 'vidyamānenaiva guṇarūpeṇa pravartate ato mukhyo nāsty eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:25_8: tatra yad uktaṃ asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yukta iti tad ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:26_0: vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kati prabheda iti na jñāyate / atas tatprabhedopadarśanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:28_0: yatrātmādyupacāro dharmopacāraś ca sa punar hetubhāvena phalabhāvena ca bhidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:28_2: phalapariṇāmaḥ punar vipākavāsanāvṛttilābhād ālayavijñānasya pūrvakarmākṣepaparisamāptau yā nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:28_3: niṣyandavāsanāvṛttilābhāc ca yā pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manasa ālayavijñānād abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:28_4: tatra pravṛttivijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalam ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāñ cādhatte /
SA20sthtvbhu:28_5: avyākṛtaṃ kliṣṭañ ca mano niṣyandavāsanām eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:29_1: yo 'sau trividhaḥ pariṇāma ukto 'sāv api na jñāyate / atas tadbhedapradarśanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:30_0: vipāko mananākhyaś ca vijñaptir viṣayasya ca / 2ab
SA20sthtvbhu:31_0: iti / sa eṣa trividhaḥ pariṇāmo vipākākhyo mananākhyo viṣayavijñaptyākhyaś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:32_0: tatsvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na tat pratīyate ity ato yasya yat svarūpaṃ tad yathākramaṃ pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_0: iti / tatreti yo 'yam anantaroktas trividhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_1: ālayākhyam ity ālayavijñānasaṃjñakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ sa vipākapariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_4: atha vālīyante upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥ kāryabhāvena tad vālīyate upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_7: yadi pravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānam asti tato 'syālambanam ākāro vā vaktavyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_8: na hi nirālambanaṃ nirākāraṃ vā vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:34_11: kiṃ kāraṇam / yasmād ālayavijñānaṃ dvidhā pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:35_0: tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:37_0: asaṃviditaka upādir yasmin asaṃviditakā ca sthānavijñaptir yasmin tad ālayavijñānam asaṃviditakopādisthānavijñaptikam /
SA20sthtvbhu:38_0: upādānam upādiḥ / sa punar ātmādivikalpavāsanā rūpādidharmavikalpavāsanā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:38_1: tatsadbhāvād ālayavijñānenātmādivikalpo rūpādivikalpaś ca kāryatvenopātta iti tad vāsanātmādivikalpānāṃ rūpādivikalpānāñ copādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:38_2: so 'sminn idaṃ tad iti pratisaṃvedanākāreṇāsaṃvidita ity atas tad asaṃviditakopādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:39_0: āśrayopādānañ copādiḥ / āśraya ātmabhāvaḥ sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:39_1: tasya punar yad upādānam upagamanam ekayogakṣematvena tad upādiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:40_1: ārūpyadhātau tu rūpavītarāgatvād rūpavipākānabhinirvṛtter nāmopādānam eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:40_2: kin tu vāsanāvastham eva tatra rūpaṃ na vipākāvastham /
SA20sthtvbhu:40_3: tat punar upādānam idantayā pratisaṃvedayitum aśakyam ity ato 'saṃvidita ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:42_2: na ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu vijñānaṃ naivāstīti śakyate pratipattum /
SA20sthtvbhu:44_0: ity uktaṃ vijñānañ cāvaśyaṃ caittaiḥ saṃprayuktam ity ato vaktavyaṃ katamaiḥ katibhiś ca tebhyaḥ saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:46_0: iti / sadeti yāvad ālayavijñānaṃ tāvad ebhiḥ sparśamanaskāravedanāsaṃjñācetanākhyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvatragair dharmair anvitam /
SA20sthtvbhu:47_4: tasmin sati tatsamakālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlo yo vikāras tena [Tvbh_56] sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:47_5: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:47_6: sparśaḥ punar indriyavikārasādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśa ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:47_9: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ veditam iti vistaraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:48_0: manaskāraś cetasa ābhogaḥ / ābhujanam ābhogaḥ / ālambane yena cittam abhimukhīkriyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:48_2: cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaś cittasyāvarjanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:48_3: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktaṃ na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tasya hi pratikṣaṇam eva vyāpāro na kṣaṇāntare /
SA20sthtvbhu:49_0: vedanā anubhavasvabhāvā / sā punar viṣayasyāhlādakaparitāpakatadubhayākāraviviktasvarūpasākṣātkaraṇabhedāt tridhā bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:50_0: evaṃ tv anye manyante / śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:52_0: tatra sukho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punaḥ saṃyogecchā jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:52_1: duḥkho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punar asaṃyogecchā /
SA20sthtvbhu:52_2: aduḥkhāsukho yasminn utpanne niruddhe cobhyaṃ na jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:53_2: tasyodgrahaṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nīlam etan na pītam iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:54_1: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manasaś ceṣṭā yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspanda iva bhavaty ayaskāntavaśād ayaḥpraspandavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:55_0: vedanā trividhā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:55_1: dharmāś catuḥ prakārāḥ kuśalā akuśalā anivṛtāvyākṛtā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:55_2: tatrālayavijñāne vid iti sāmānyopadeśena na vijñāyate tisṝṇāṃ vedanānāṃ katamā vedanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:55_3: tathā tad api kiṃ kuśalam akuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti na vijñāyata ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:57_1: upekṣaivālayavijñāne vedanā na sukhā na duḥkhā tayoḥ paricchinnālambanākāratvād rāgadveṣānuśayitatvāc ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:62_0_0: yathālayavijñānam ekāntena vipāko 'paricchinnālambanākāraṃ sadā sparśādibhir anvitaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:62_0_1: tatra copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtañ ca tathā sparśādayo 'py ekāntena vipākā evāparicchinnālambanākārāś
SA20sthtvbhu:62_1: ātmānaṃ hitvetaraiś caturbhir ālayavijñānena ca nityam anugatās teṣu copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtāś cālayavijñānavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:62_2: na hi vipākena saṃprayuktānām avipākatvam aparicchinnālambanākāreṇa ca paricchinnālambanākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:63_0: kiṃ punas tad ālayavijñānam ekam abhinnam āsaṃsāram anuvartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:63_1: uta saṃtānena / na hi tad ekam abhinnam anuvartate kṣaṇikatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:66_2: udakasamūhasya pūrvāparabhāgāvicchedena pravāha ogha ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:66_3_0: yathā hy oghas tṛṇakāṣṭhagomayādīn ākarṣayaṅ gacchaty evam ālayavijñānam api puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyakarmavāsanānugataṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:66_3_1: sparśamanaskārādīn ākarṣan srotasāsaṃsāram avyuparataṃ pravartata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:67_0: tasyaivaṃ śrotasā pravṛttasya kasyām avasthāyāṃ vyāvṛttir ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:69_0: kiṃ punar arhattvam / yadyogād arhann ity ucyate / kasya punar yogād arhann ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:69_2: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyām ālayavijñānāśritadauṣṭhulyaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ālayavijñānaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:70_3: tatra yathā cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ cakṣurādaya āśrayatvena rūpādayaś cālambanatvena prasiddhā naiva kliṣṭasya manasa āśraya ālambanaṃ vā prasiddham /
SA20sthtvbhu:71_0: na ca vijñānam āśrayālambananirapekṣaṃ yujyata ity ataḥ kliṣṭasya manasa āśrayālambanapratipādanārthaṃ niruktipratipādanārthañ cāha /
SA20sthtvbhu:73_0: tad āśritya pravartata iti tacchabdenālayavijñānam abhisaṃbadhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:73_1: tadvāsanāśrayo hy ālayavijñānam atas tad āśritya pravartate santānenotpadyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:73_2: atha vā yasmin dhātau bhūmau vālayavijñānaṃ vipākas tad api kliṣṭaṃ manas taddhātukaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ ceti tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt tad āśritya pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:74_0: tadālambam ity ālayavijñānālambanam eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saṃprayogād ahaṃ mamety ālayavijñānālambanatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:74_1: kathaṃ punar yata eva cittād utpadyate tad eva tadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:74_2: yathā tad anicchatāṃ keṣāṃcit kasyāñcid avasthāyāṃ yata eva cittān manovijñānam utpadyate tadālambanam eva tad utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:75_0: manonāma vijñānam iti mana iti nāma ākhyā yasya vijñānasya tad ālayavijñānam āśritya pravarte tadālambanaṃ ca manonāmety anenālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānāc ca vyavacchinatti /
SA20sthtvbhu:75_1: tat punaḥ kiṃ svabhāvam ity āha /

SA20sthtvbhu:174_1: rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvāsatkāryaprabhavahetuṣu rāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prajñapyate na tu svatantram asti /

SA20sthtvbhu:178_1: kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:179_0: pramādo yair lobhadveṣamohakausīdyaiḥ kleśād rāgadveṣamohādikāc cittaṃ na rakṣati kuśalaṃ ca tatpratipakṣabhūtaṃ na bhāvayati /
SA20sthtvbhu:180_0: muṣitā smṛtiḥ kliṣṭā smṛtiḥ / kliṣṭeti kleśasaṃprayuktā / iyañ ca vikṣepasaṃniśrayadānakarmikā /
SA20sthtvbhu:181_3: yai rāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃ samādhyālambanād bahiḥ kṣipyate teṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:182_0: asaṃprajanyaṃ kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayāsaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā abhikramapratikramādiṣu vartate karaṇīyākaraṇīyājñānāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:183_1: kutsitaṃ kṛtam iti kukṛtam / tadbhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam / iha tu kukṛtaviṣayaś cetaso vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ caitasikādhikārāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:184_1: vṛttir ālambane pravṛttiḥ / sāsvatantrā cetaso yato bhavati tan middham /
SA20sthtvbhu:184_2: kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthā vā vṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā sā yato bhavati tan middham /
SA20sthtvbhu:184_4: etac ca mohāṃśe prajñapanān mohāṃśikaṃ kṛtyātipattisaṃniśrayadānakarmakañ ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:185_2: manaso jalpo manojalpaḥ / jalpa iva jalpaḥ / jalpo 'rthakathanam / cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:185_3: tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadācic cittacetanayor vitarkaḥ prajñaptiḥ kadācit prajñācetasor yathākramam anabhyūhābhyuhāvasthayoḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:185_4: atha vā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaḥ prajñaptis tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:185_5: sa eva cittasyaudārikatā / audārikateti sthūlatā vastumātraparyeṣaṇākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:189_0: dvayañ ca dvayañ ca dvaye / te punaḥ kaukṛtyamiddhe vitarkavicārau ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:189_1: ete ca catvāro dharmā dvidhā kliṣṭā akliṣṭāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:190_0: tatrākuśalam akṛtvā kuśalañ ca kṛtvā yaś cetaso vilekhas tat saṃkliṣṭaṃ kaukṛtyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:190_1: yat kuśalam akṛtvākuśalañ ca kṛtvā tat kaukṛtyam akliṣṭam /
SA20sthtvbhu:191_0: middham api kliṣṭacittāviddhaṃ kliṣṭacittasaṃprayuktaṃ ca kliṣṭam /
SA20sthtvbhu:193_0: tatra ye kaukṛtyamiddhavitarkavicārāḥ kliṣṭās ta evopakleśā netare /
SA20sthtvbhu:194_0_0: tatra yathā rūpaśabdādyupalabdhiḥ ṣaṭprakārā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvaiś caitasikaiḥ saṃprayujyate
SA20sthtvbhu:194_0_1: sarvatragair viniyataiḥ kuśalaiḥ kleśair upakleśaiś ca evaṃ trivedanā tisṛbhiś ca
SA20sthtvbhu:194_0_2: vedanābhiḥ saṃprayujyate sukhayā duḥkhayā aduḥkhāsukhayā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:194_1: saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyeṣu rūpādiṣu tadutpatteḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:194_2: ālayavijñānan tu sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhir eva saṃprayujyate nānyaiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:194_4: kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhiś caturbhiś ca kleśair ātmamohādibhiḥ sadā saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:195_1: idam idānīñ cintyate / kiṃ pañcānāñ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhye 'py ālayavijñānād ekasyaivotpattir bhavati na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:195_2: yathaike manyante / na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā yugapat samanantarapratyayābhāvād ekasyaiva vijñānasyotpattir bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:195_3: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ bahūnāṃ samantarapratyayatvaṃ pratipattum utsahate /
SA20sthtvbhu:196_1: evaṃ dvayor bahūnāñ ca pratyayasāṃnidhye utpattir bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:197_1: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale // 15
SA20sthtvbhu:198_1: pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ bījāśrayatvāt tadutpatter gatiṣu janmopādānāc cālayavijñānaṃ mūlavijñānam ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:198_2: yathāpratyayam udbhava iti yasya yasya yaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃnihitas tasya tasya niyamenodbhava ātmalābhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:198_3: saha na veti yugapat krameṇa vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:198_4: taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jala ity ālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānānāṃ yugapad ayugapac cotpattau dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:199_0: tadyathā viśālamate mahata udakaughasya vahataḥ saced ekasya
SA20sthtvbhu:199_2: taraṅgaṃ pravartate / saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:199_4: saṃbahulāni taraṅgāṇi pravartante / na ca tasyodakaughasya srotasā
SA20sthtvbhu:199_5: vahataḥ samucchittir bhavati / na paryupayogaḥ prajñāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:199_6: evam eva viśālamate tadoghasthānīyam ālayavijñānaṃ saṃniśritya
SA20sthtvbhu:199_8: pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:199_9: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ sacet pañcānāṃ vijñānānām utpattipratyayaḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:199_10: pratyupasthito bhavati sakṛd yāvat pañcānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:201_0: ādānavijñāna gabhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījo /
SA20sthtvbhu:201_1: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśi mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyur
SA20sthtvbhu:202_0: iti / na hi vijñānapratiniyamenālambanapratyayavat samanantarapratyaya iṣyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:202_2: ata ekasmād api samanantarapratyayād ālambanapratyayasānnidhye dvayor bahūnāṃ vā vijñānānām utpattir na virūdhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:202_4: pañcānāñ ca yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhya ekenaivotpattavyaṃ na pañcabhir apīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:202_5: tasmād alambanasadbhāve pañcānām api cotpattir ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:203_0: idam īdānīṃ vaktavyam / kiṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha pravartate vinā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:205_0: iti / sarvadeti sarvakālaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha vinā cety arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:206_1: samāpattidvayān middhān mūrcchanād apy acittakād iti / (16bd)
SA20sthtvbhu:207_0: tatrāsaṃjñikam asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasya yaś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:209_1_0: tatrāsaṃjñisamāpattiḥ / tṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgasyordhvam avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa
SA20sthtvbhu:209_1_1: manasikāreṇa manovijñānasya tatsaṃprayuktānāñ ca caittānāṃ yo nirodhaḥ so 'trāsaṃjñisamāpattir
SA20sthtvbhu:209_3: āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ / sa ca samāpatticittād anantarañ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayaḥ prāpyata iti samāpattir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:209_4: nirodhasamāpattir ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa sasaṃprayogasya manovijñānasya kliṣṭasya ca manaso yo nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:210_0: acittakaṃ middhaṃ gāḍhamiddhopahatatvād āśrayasya tāvatkālaṃ manovijñānāpravṛtter acittakam ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:211_0: acittikā mūrcchā / āgantukenābhighātena vātapittaśleṣmavaiṣamyeṇa vā yad āśrayavaiṣamyaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:212_0: etāḥ pañcāvasthā varjayitvā tadanyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu manovijñānapravṛttir veditavyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:212_1: evam āsaṃjñikādiṣu manovijñāne niruddhe tadapagame punaḥ kuta utpadyate yatas tasya kālakriyā na bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:213_0: yatra vijñānapariṇāme ātmadharmopacāraḥ sa punas tridhety uddiśya vistareṇa trividho 'pi nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:214_1: idānīm ātmadharmopacāro yaḥ pravartate sa vijñānapariṇāma eva na vijñānapariṇāmāc ca pṛthag asty ātmā dharmā ceti yat pratijñātaṃ tatprasādhanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:215_1: tena tan nāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñāptimātrakam // 17
SA20sthtvbhu:216_0: iti / yo 'yaṃ vijñānapariṇāmas trividho 'nantaram abhihitaḥ so 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:218_0: tena trividhena vikalpenālayavijñānakliṣṭamanaḥpravṛttivijñānasvabhāvena sasaṃprayogeṇa yad vikalpyate bhājanam ātmāskandhadhātvāyatanarūpaśabdādikaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:218_1: vastu tan nāstīty ataḥ sa vijñānapariṇāmo vikalpa ucyate / asadālambanatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:219_0: kathaṃ punar etad vijñāyate tadālambanam asad iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:219_1: yad dhi yasya kāraṇaṃ tasmin samagre cāviruddhe ca tad utpadyate nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:219_2: vijñānañ ca māyāgandharvanagarasvapnatimirādāv asaty apyālambane jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:219_3: yadi ca vijñānasyālambanapratibaddha utpādaḥ syād evaṃ sati māyādiṣv arthābhāvān na vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:220_1: tasmāt pūrvakān niruddhāt tajjātīyavijñānād vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:220_2: na bāhyād arthāt tasminn asaty api bhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:220_3: dṛṣṭā cābhinne 'py arthe pratipattṝṇāṃ parasparaviruddhā pratipattiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:220_5: tasmād adhyāropitarūpatvād vikalpasyālambanam asad iti pratipattavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:223_0: iti / teneti tasmāt / yasmāt pariṇāmātmakena vikalpena yad vikalpyate tena tan nāsti tasmād viṣayābhāvāt sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam /
SA20sthtvbhu:224_0: yadi sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam eva na tato 'nyaḥ kartā karaṇaṃ vāsti kathaṃ mūlavijñānād anadhiṣṭhitād asati karaṇe vikalpāḥ pravartanta ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:225_0: sarvabījaṃ hi vijñānaṃ pariṇāmas tathā tathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:225_1: yāty anyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate // 18
SA20sthtvbhu:226_0: tatra sarvadharmotpādanaśaktyanugamāt sarvabījaṃ vijñānam ity ālayavijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:226_1: vijñānaṃ hy asarvabījam apy astīty ataḥ sarvabījam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:226_2: vijñānād anyad api kaiścit pradhānādi sarvabījaṃ kalpyata iti vijñānam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:226_3: atha vā / ekapadavyabhicāre 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvadarśanān nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:227_0: pariṇāmas tathā tathā yāty anyonyavaśād iti / (18bc)
SA20sthtvbhu:228_1: tathā tatheti tasya tasya vikalpasyānantarotpādanasamarthāvasthāṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:229_1_0: anyonyavaśād iti / tathā hi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ svaśaktiparipoṣe vartamāne śaktiviśiṣṭasyālayavijñānapariṇāmasya
SA20sthtvbhu:229_1_1: nimittaṃ so 'pi ālayavijñānapariṇāmaś cakṣurādivijñānasya nimittaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:229_2: evam anyonyavaśād yasmād ubhayaṃ pravartate tasmād ālayavijñānād anyenānadhiṣṭhitād anekaprakāro vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:229_3: tatra ca vartamāne janmani yathālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānasyotpattir bhavati tathākhyātam /
SA20sthtvbhu:230_0: idānīṃ vijñaptimātre anāgataṃ janma vartamānajanmanirodhe sati yathā pratisaṃdhīyate tat pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:232_1: tena karmaṇā yad anāgatātmabhāvābhinirvṛttaye ālayavijñāne sāmarthyam āhitaṃ sā karmavāsanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:232_3: tatra vijñānāt pṛthag eva svasantānādhyāsitaṃ grāhyam astīty adhyavasāyo grāhyagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:232_4: tac ca vijñānena pratīyate vijñāyate gṛhyata iti yo 'yaṃ niścayaḥ sa grahakagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:233_1: grāhadvayavāsanā tu sarvakarmavāsanānāṃ yathāsvam ākṣiptātmabhāvotpādane pravṛttānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:234_0: evañ ca na kevalāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanānanugṛhītā vipākañ janayantīty uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:235_0: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāke 'nyaṃ vipākaṃ janayanti tad iti / (19cd)
SA20sthtvbhu:236_0_0: pūrvajanmopacitena karmaṇā ya iti vipāko 'bhinirvṛttas tasmin kṣīṇa ity ākṣepakāle
SA20sthtvbhu:236_0_1: paryantāvasthite yathābalaṃ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitā upabhūktād vipākād
SA20sthtvbhu:236_2: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāka ity anena śāśvatāntaṃ pariharati /
SA20sthtvbhu:237_1: tad eva ca sarvabījakaṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam iti kuta etat /
SA20sthtvbhu:237_2: āgamād yuktitaś ca / uktaṃ hi bhagavatābhidharmasūtre /
SA20sthtvbhu:238_2: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca //
SA20sthtvbhu:239_0: na cālayavijñānam antareṇa saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttir vā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:239_3: tatrālayavijñānād anyat saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_0: saṃsārasyālayavijñānānabhyupagame pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_1_0: tatra ye saṃskārāḥ prātisaṃdhikavijñānapratyayatveneṣyante teṣāñ ciraniruddhatvān
SA20sthtvbhu:240_1_1: niruddhasya cāsatvād asataś ca pratyayatvābhāvān na saṃskārapratyayaṃ pratisandhivijñānaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:240_2: pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam apy asti na kevalaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_3: tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayaṃ na nāmarūpam iti kā tatra yuktiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_5: na tu vijñānam iti / (Tvbh_118]) katamad anyad vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_6: yad uttarakālam iti cet tasya prātisandhikanāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
SA20sthtvbhu:240_8: ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_0: saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyā api na saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_1: kiṃ kāraṇam / na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā svātmany ādhātuṃ samarthaṃ svātmani kāritravirodhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_3: anutpannasya cāsattvāt / nāpy utpanne pūrvasya tadā niruddhatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_4: acittikāsu ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasaṃbhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_6: evaṃ yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:241_7: tataś ca saṃsārapravṛttir eva na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:242_0: tasmād avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārās tadadhivāsitañ cālayavijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:242_1: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau nāmarūpam ity eṣaiva nītir anavadyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:243_0: saṃsāranivṛttir api ālayavijñāne asati na yujyate /
